rtega_mnemonic:
驅驅RS
驱驱		駆駈 敺drive, run, gallop, advance, inspire, impel, spur a horse
  • drive through an area 區/区 with a horse 馬
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 驱)
Pictophonetic: 區 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
驅動 [ qū dòng ]: to drive; to propel; drive (vehicle wheel); drive mechanism (tape or disk); device driver (computing software)
驅逐 [ qū zhú ]: to expel; to deport; banishment
驅使 [ qū shǐ ]: to urge; to prompt; to spur on; to order sb about
驅趕 [ qū gǎn ]: to drive (vehicle); to drive out; to chase away; to herd (people towards a gate)

heisig_chinese_memo: I hop in the car and drive away from all of my problems in the city to retire in the country region with horses.

humanum_full_description_en:
From " horse " to " zone " sound. The original meaning is to ride a horse forward. "Shuowen": "Drive, Ma Chi also. From the horse, district sound. Drive, the ancient prose to drive from Zhuan." Duan Yucai changed to "Drive the horse", saying: "To drive a horse, you can use your own words. "As in "Poetry. Tang Feng. "Mountain has a pivot": "Children have carts and horses, and they drive themselves." Kong Yingdashu: "Riding a horse means driving." "Book of Rites. Qu Li Shang: "The king's car will drive, and the servant will stand in front of the horse. If you have driven, the servant will show you the effect of driving, fight from the upper right, take the two, kneel and ride, separate the strategy, drive it, five Stand by step."

" Drive " also generally refers to driving away humans and animals. "Jade articles. Horse Department: "Expulsion, expulsion." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Huan Gong Twelve Years": "Tomorrow, people will fight out and drive the Chu servants in the mountains." "Mencius. "Teng Wengong 2": "The former Yu suppressed the flood and the world was peaceful, Zhou Gong also bargained at the barbarian, driving away the beasts while the people were peaceful, Confucius became the "Spring and Autumn" and the chaotic officials were afraid.

" Drive " means service and control. Such as "Mencius. "Liang Hui Wang": "Then the good will be driven, and the people will follow it lightly." "Three Kingdoms. Wu Shu. "Zhang Gu Zhuge Step Biography": "A husband who is a man is a man who can control a hero and drive a group of talents. Doesn't it mean a man who drives in the wilderness and the school is brave than the beast?"

" Drive " means Mercedes-Benz. "Guang Ya. "Shi Gong": "Drive, run." For example, the Three Kingdoms Shu Zhuge Liang "Previously Served as a Teacher": "The first emperor did not regard his ministers as sordid, but he was in vain. Thanks, Xu Xiandi used to drive." "Book of Jin. "Wang Jun's Biography": "By the way, the prestige has already been established."

" Drive " means to move forward. Such as "Rituals. Shi Hun Li": "Women multiply by a few, Mujiajing, is driven." Zheng Xuan's note: "Drive, do it." "Historical Records. "The Biographies of Mencius Xunqing": "Suitable for Zhao, Pingyuan Jun walks sideways; Ruyan, the pioneer of King Zhao embraces Hui."
humanum_short_description_en: From " horse " to " zone " sound. The original meaning is to ride a horse forward.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「區」聲。本義是策馬前進。《說文》：「驅，馬馳也。从馬，區聲。敺，古文驅从攴。」段玉裁改為「驅馬也」，云：「驅馬，自人策馬言之。」如《詩．唐風．山有樞》：「子有車馬，弗馳弗驅。」孔穎達疏：「策馬謂之驅。」《禮記．曲禮上》：「君車將駕，則僕執策立於馬前。已駕，僕展軨效駕，奮衣由右上，取貳綏，跪乘，執策分轡，驅之，五步而立。」

　　「驅」也泛指驅趕人畜。《玉篇．馬部》：「驅，逐遣也。」如《左傳．桓公十二年》：「明日，絞人爭出，驅楚役徒於山中。」《孟子．滕文公下》：「昔者禹抑洪水而天下平，周公兼夷狄，驅猛獸而百姓寧，孔子成《春秋》而亂臣賊子懼。」

　　「驅」表示役使、駕馭。如《孟子．梁惠王上》：「然後驅而之善，故民之從之也輕。」《三國志．吳書．張顧諸葛步傳》：「夫為人君者，謂能駕御英雄，驅使群賢，豈謂馳逐於原野，校勇於猛獸者乎？」

　　「驅」表示奔馳。《廣雅．釋宮》：「驅，犇也。」如三國蜀諸葛亮〈前出師表〉：「先帝不以臣卑鄙，猥自枉屈，三顧臣於草廬之中，諮臣以當世之事，由是感激，遂許先帝以驅馳。」《晉書．王濬傳》：「順說長驅，威名已著。」

　　「驅」表示行進、前進。如《儀禮．士昏禮》：「婦乘以几，姆加景，乃驅。」鄭玄注：「驅，行也。」《史記．孟子荀卿列傳》：「適趙，平原君側行撇席；如燕，昭王擁彗先驅。」
humanum_short_description: 從「馬」，「區」聲。本義是策馬前進。

驅字的基本解释

驅
qū
见“驱”。

驅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《廣韻》豈俱切，平虞，溪。］
［《廣韻》區遇切，去遇，溪。］
“毆3”的今字。“驱1”的繁体字。“去3”的被通假字。亦作“駆1”。亦作“駈1”。
(1)鞭马前进。
(2)泛指驱赶其他牲畜。
(3)行进；快速行进。
(4)驱逐；赶走。
(5)驾驭；役使。
(6)追随；追逐。
(7)逼迫，迫使。
(8)指驱口。

驅字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驅； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1444第24
〔古文〕敺【唐韻】豈俱切【集韻】【韻會】虧于切【正韻】丘于切，?音區。【玉篇】逐遣也。【禮·月令】驅獸毋害五穀。　又【說文】走馬謂之馳，策馬謂之驅。【玉篇】驟也，奔馳也。【易·比卦】王用三驅失前禽。　又軍前鋒曰先驅，次前曰中驅。　又【集韻】【韻會】?祛尤切，音丘。義同。【詩·鄘風】載馳載驅，歸唁衞侯。【陸雲賦】昶愁心以自邁，肅旁人以曾驅。詔河馮以淸川，命湘娥而安流。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?區遇切，音姁。義同。【班固·東都賦】舉㷭伐鼓，申令三驅。輕車霆激，驍騎電騖。【陶侃相風賦】華蓋警乗，奉引先驅。豹飾在後，葳蕤先路。　又通作歐。【史記·趙世家】歐，代地。【前漢·食貨志】歐民而歸之農。　又叶直谷切，音逐。【詩·秦風】游環脅驅。叶下續轂。　俗作駈䮃，?非。

驅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
驅字的起名意思

暂无。

drive
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Guangyun" Qi Juqi, Pingyu, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" District Yuqi, Quyu, Xi. ]
The modern word for "O3". The traditional characters of "DRIVE 1". "Go to 3" was passed falsely. Also known as "駆1". Also known as "駈1".
(1) Whip the horse forward.
(2) Generally refers to driving away other livestock.
(3) March; fast travel.
(4) To expel; to drive away.
(5) Driving; Serving.
(6) To follow; to chase.
(7) Forcing, forcing.
(8) Refers to the drive mouth.
